data.description: Sends &t abulates SNMP to multiple hosts
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SNMP and Net::SNMP can both send a SNMP requests to one machine.

    This module, SNMP::Multi, sends those requests to multiple machines
    and aggregates the data into a iterable data-structure.

    It's very fast and it takes pains to handle missing data, and
    timing issues sanely.

    TIA, Joshua

    PS This is request #3 or #4 for this namespace.
